resources.string:
Welcome to our Informative Application! This app is designed solely for educational purposes — to help users stay informed and aware of common online threats and safe practices.


In today’s digital world, understanding how to recognize and avoid scams and spam is essential. This application provides valuable information about:

 Spam Types
 Learn about different types of spam like email spam, SMS scams, phishing links, fake social media profiles, and more.

 Safety Tips
 Discover simple but effective tips to protect your personal information, avoid suspicious links, secure your devices, and browse the internet safely.

 Red Flags
 Understand the common warning signs of scams and frauds, such as too-good-to-be-true offers, urgent payment requests, fake job postings, and suspicious messages. 

Our goal is to help you stay alert, informed, and secure in the digital world. This app does not collect any personal data and is purely meant to spread awareness and promote safe online habits.
